body:
Hi Grasshoppe,

Anton is right. You just need to set a number of meshing parameters based on the gridSize.

Here is the sample code that you can find in Honeybee_Generate Test Points:

[https://github.com/mostaphaRoudsari/Honeybee/blob/master/src/Honeyb...](https://github.com/mostaphaRoudsari/Honeybee/blob/master/src/Honeybee_Generate%20Test%20Points.py#L57-L78)

Mostapha
